cards.name: Light Mode
cards.description: You are caught using light mode in VSCode. GO TO JAIL!

cards.name: Beautiful Sunset
cards.description: The sunset is gorgeous tonight. Move to the slope!

cards.name: Heavy Sleeper
cards.description: You slept through your alarm and it was going off for 30 minutes. It woke up your entire hall. GO TO JAIL!

cards.name: Wednesday Night!
cards.description: It's Wednesday night and you know what that means... move to Level B.

cards.name: Parents Visiting
cards.description: Your parents are visiting campus! Go to CTB for lunch.

cards.name: Re-do the Semester
cards.description: You have a few classes to retake... Move to Go.

cards.name: Real Estate Concentration
cards.description: As part of your concentration in real estate, you have won a free house for your cheapest property!

cards.name: Physics Requirement
cards.description: Go to Rockefeller Hall to visit Curious Cat for your required physics lecture.

cards.name: Office Hours
cards.description: You need some help on your 3110 assignment. Go to office hours in Rhodes Hall.

cards.name: Explorer
cards.description: You've heard the urban legends and it's time to test them out. Go find the tunnels!

cards.name: Quarantine
cards.description: It's 2020 again and you're being sent to the Statler hotel because you told the Daily Check that you have a stuffy nose.

cards.name: Hotelie!
cards.description: Have a free hotel for your cheapest property! If you don't own any properties, you're out of luck.

cards.name: Swim Test
cards.description: You failed the swim test, so you can't graduate just yet. Go back to Go.

cards.name: Double Chance
cards.description: Skip ahead to the next Chance space!

cards.name: I'm Feeling Lucky
cards.description: Skip ahead to the next Community Chest space!

cards.name: Secrets Unlocked
cards.description: Martha selected you for a private tour of her weather machine. Proceed to the all powerful weather machine.

cards.name: Bad Finance Bro!
cards.description: You are accused of embezzeling funds from your business club. You're going to jail.
